channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @BarbMcQuade That's why I think it must be Ginni Thomas.

@jeffjarvis As someone who lived in Silicon Valley for 30 years, let me tell you -- it was totally a documentary. I think I was actually in a few episodes myself (names changed). It certainly captured the lifestyle. I thought I was going to hate it but I loved it.

@daverpvb They didn't lie. If you listen carefully they said it's a precedent, which was true. These were carefully crafted talking points, obviously all coming from the same place, to help people who want to believe they won't overturn the precedent believe it, without lying.
The government doesn't have any business regulating religion, and when life begins is a religious question. https://t.co/at85KUcAd6
@johnrobb no doubt.
@johnrobb I don;t think "stolen" or "thief" applies, the property that was published belongs to the United States, and we are the United States, so they're just disclosing something we already own.
@jeremyzilar I give up.

The Supreme Court is protects the rights of Americans. They’re not a religious body, they are not chartered to adjudicate religious questions, because there is no religion attached to our government. That part is in the text of the Constitution, for our textualist friends.
The Roe opinion and the case against the Supreme Court of the United States. https://t.co/I6G5KW7RXw
@JRubinBlogger Hope

I'm glad @maddow has signed off four nights a week. Now there isn't one MSNBC host I'm addicted to. I watched Stephanie Ruhl last night and she's the best interviewer they have. I think if people broke their addiction to punditry, we'd all do a lot better.

Roberts should resign to let Biden nominate and approve the next chief. Admit failure to maintain integrity of the court and let its reformation begin now. Gorsuch and Barrett should be removed and a conservative and liberal should replace them.
McConnell should be strongly advised to retire now.

Let’s say you’re pregnant in Texas and you get on a plane to go to California and come back after having an abortion. Do you get arrested? Did you have to register your pregnancy? Someone should ask Alito.

Look, we have to FILL the senate with Democrats. And we need to have a lot more Dems in the House and we need to add a dozen more justices who aren't Federalist Society nuts and get Roe in there as a law and whatever else we need to turn this corner. We are really WOKE now.
And stop complaining. Let's win.
Yeah but Mets fans hate: 1. The Yankees 2. The Dodgers And we don't give a flying fuck about 3. that other team whoever they are. https://t.co/zI0UbT2LSm
@akapczynski Clarence Thomas's wife, Ginni.
Nintendo Switch Sports players are breaking TVs like it’s 2006. https://t.co/fVUL2WHXFJ
Twitter warns of possible employee exodus before Musk completes purchase. https://t.co/TzQkjydlrQ
Murkowski: Draft Roe v. Wade decision “rocks my confidence” in Supreme Court. https://t.co/pRHei0aoF6
@ElieNYC We need organization now.
@TaylorLorenz sounds like a facebook group to me, but i'm an old fashioned just web2 guy.
Just admit that you love Twitter even if Elon Musk is buying it. https://t.co/DSWMmXkPSf
